All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Assets
 
BedTile
The BedTile class extends the Tile class and represents a non-solid tile.
Button
 
Character
 
DoorTile
The DoorTile class extends the Tile class and represents a non-solid tile that acts as a door.
Floor
The `Floor` class generates a floor plan with randomly placed rooms and sets a random room with neighboring rooms as the current room.
FloorTile
The FloorTile class extends the Tile class and represents a non-solid floor tile.
Game
The Game class is a Java implementation of a game loop with methods for initializing, starting, stopping, updating, and drawing the game.
GameWindow
 
Hero
 
ImageLoader
 
Item
 
KeyManager
 
MainMenu
The MainMenu class contains buttons for starting a game, accessing memories and options, and quitting the game, as well as a button for returning to the main menu during gameplay.
Map
The Map class is a singleton that contains a Floor object and methods for updating and drawing the tiles on the floor.
Mouse
 
PlayState
The PlayState class initializes a hero and a main menu, updates and draws them based on whether the game has started or not.
RockTile
The RockTile class extends the Tile class and creates a solid tile with a rock image.
Room
The Room class generates and manages the tiles and doors of a room in a game.
SpriteSheet
 
Tile
The Tile class defines different types of tiles with their respective images and properties for a game.
WallTile
The WallTile class extends the Tile class and represents a solid wall tile.
WaterTile
The WaterTile class extends the Tile class and sets the tile image to water while also making it solid.
